column6: there was a traffic accident where a man driving a taxi carrying passengers was hit by a Highlander car driven by a Chinese person. Two people were seriously injured when one of the carsoverturned on the Russian Federation Road in Sangkat Kakap II
column9: a white Starex taxi with license plate Phnom Penh 2AY-7839 with 6 passengers was traveling on the Russian Federation Road
column10: when suddenly a gray Highlander car with license plate Phnom Penh 2AN-4035
column11: driven by a Chinese man at high speed collided head-on with the taxi. The Highlander to crashed into a divider
column12: overturned and seriously injured two people. The victims were rushed to a nearby hospital. ------POST NEWS
